name: MiniX
description: MiniX is the Governance token of Minicaps.io, The World’s first Anti-Scam Crypto Listing Hub for Low Market Cap Projects. Minicaps' main objective is a listing platform for investors seeking to buy-in early into crypto projects while employing unique and explicit tools to increase the most important aspects within the decentralized finance world – Trust and Security. With MiniX, you get a 2-tier rewards token (PolyX and MATIC), Weekly BuyBack-and-Burn & Exclusive Access to Minicaps premium features.
